name: Fitness application
description: A fitness app that calculates burned calories based on selected sport activity and workout duration, tracks daily calorie intake and macronutrients, and provides workout history.

name: Portfolio website
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects. Built to highlight my work with JavaScript, React, Express, MongoDB, and more.

name: Lifestyle & Health Dashboard
description: A data analytics project focused on health indicators, analyzing and visualizing key metrics to provide insights for improving well-being.
